sentence.idiomatic: I’m running a small business myself.
I didn’t realize that this kind of small business was quite lucrative.
He started this as a small business. Now it’s already a big company.
Don’t worry. He is just a little unhappy, that’s all.
This piece of clothing is only fifty yuan. It’s extremely cheap.
I’ve only been late once, that’s all. Why are you so angry?
He came to China at the beginning of this year.
From the beginning of the year until now our relationship hasn’t been good.
Was this plan drawn up at the beginning of the year?
Our company is already listed on the stock market in Hong Kong.
What are the required terms for a company to go public?
Is this a public company?
On his way home he ran into an old classmate.
I just ran into a strange thing.
It seems like I’ve run into him somewhere before.
He is so young, it’s surprising that he’s already married.
There is only one hour left. I’m surprised you haven’t set off yet.
It was so nice in the afternoon. It’s surprising that it rained in the evening.
He is a famous oil millionaire. He runs the largest oil company.
He’s so amazing. He was a millionaire by age twenty.
I’ve heard that female millionaire wrote a book.
Lili, wow! It’s really you! I almost didn’t recognize you!
Liu Xiang! What a coincidence! How long has it been since we’ve seen each other? Hey, how come you’re here drinking coffee? I remember you used to really hate coffee.
Ha ha. It’s really been too long since we last met. Now I can’t live without my coffee! My company is just upstairs. I come and buy quite a few cups every day.
Wow, not bad! If you’re working in such a nice office building, it must be a big company!
Well, it isn’t some big company. It’s just my own small business, that’s all. We just got listed on the U.S. stock market at the beginning of the year.
Oh my! Your own company got listed on the stock market? That’s amazing! No wonder you haven’t gotten in touch with me for so long. You have probably forgotten your old friend.
How could I forget you? Oh no, I’m really sorry. I have a meeting to go to soon. I will give you a call later tonight, OK?
Hurry up and go. Let’s get in touch again.
OK, I’ll go now then. It was great to run into you!
Lili, I am so sorry! You had to wait for me for once. It’s all my fault!
It doesn’t matter. I’m always late, aren’t you the one that always has to wait for me?
It should be me waiting for you. Hey, that guy just now, is he your friend? It seems I’ve seen him on TV before. Oh, he’s Liu Xiang! The 30-year-old internet millionaire!
It seems he really is pretty amazing! We’re old friends.
Old friends? How come I haven’t heard you said you have this kind of old friend before? Are you very close?
So-so. It’s all in the past. What… are you unhappy?
